oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Story Hour Room
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: Cossitt Library; libraries;
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: The Story Hour Room at Cossitt Library, which was above the children's room. According to the back of the photo, "Mr. Johnson used to tell stories with aid of slides."
oai_dc:dc.dc:creator: Poland
